item.title: Hegseth Can Make The Pentagon Great Again By Ending The Defense Contractor Gravy Train
item.description: Making the Department of Defense great again starts with making the habit of trading senior military honors for dollars shameful.

item.title: LA Fire Chief Made DEI One Of Department’s Top Priorities, Docs Show

item.title: It’s Hard To Take Zuckerberg’s Sudden About-Face On Free Speech Seriously
item.description: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg has done an about-face, branding himself friendly to Trump and free speech. Why the change in attitude?

item.title: How Melania Trump’s ‘Be Best’ Initiative Could ‘Make America Healthy Again’
item.description: Any White House initiative to tackle childhood obesity would be a natural parallel with efforts to 'make America healthy again.'

item.title: Minnesota House Democrats Take Opening Day Off, Will Get Paid For Doing Nothing
item.description: It is like one team skipping the Super Bowl because their quarterback is injured. If your team is not ready by game day, it’s tough luck.
